english.segment1: She told me dont let them in. Youre a copy of a copy. She told me dont come again. This is awful. This is all wrong.
english.segment2: Now I feel it coming back again. Slide down the walls, on the floor. Oh, Ill pretend this isnt happening this time.
english.segment3: She told me, stop listening to the voices, and what they said. She told me dont fall again. I am wretched, I am loathed.
english.segment4: She told me, dont kill the villains. The pain is not escaping. She told me, dont kill the villains. Just let them feast on their own perfection. She told me, dont kill the villains. The pain is not escaping. She told me you cannot stay. But Im stable. Im okay.
english.segment5: I said it, we all regret it. Now this room is cold and spinning. Give us cause to keep them breathing again this time. She told me dont let them in. Youre a copy of a copy.
